1.SceneDescription:
Chandler and Joey's, 3:02 A.M., Chandler is up. There's a knock on the door and
Chandler answers it.

lines.Character: (Joey enters and Chandler pushes her away
lines.Line: Joey enters and Chandler pushes her away.

lines.Character: (Joey enters and Chandler pushes her away
lines.Line: Joey enters and Chandler pushes her away.
Uhh, 9. (He pushes the clock into the sink.

Well that's because you always sleep to noon, silly! This is what 9
looks like

I guess I'll get washed up then. Watch that sunrise. (He goes into the
bathroom.
I'm really getting tired of sneaking around
I'm really getting tired of sneaking around

I know, me too. Hey! Y'know what if we went away for a whole weekend?
Y'know we'd have no interruptions and we could be naked the entire time
All weekend? That's a whole lotta naked
All weekend? That's a whole lotta naked

Yeah, I can say that I have a conference and you can say you have a
chef thing

Ohh, I've always wanted to go to this culinary fair that they have in
Jersey
Okay, y'know your not though. Let's go. (He starts for his bedroom.

2.SceneDescription:
Atlantic City, New Jersey, Chandler and Monica are about to start their weekend
of sex, sex, nothing but sex.

lines.Line: (jumping on the bed) I can't believe it! We're here
Ooh, chocolates on the pillows! I love that
Oh, you should live with Joey, Roll-os everywhere
Come here. (He does, and they kiss.) Okay, be right back.
Come here. (He does, and they kiss.) Okay, be right back.

lines.Character:
(Goes to the bathroom and Chandler turns on the TV and finds a high-speed police
chase
lines.Line:
Goes to the bathroom and Chandler turns on the TV and finds a high-speed police
chase.
Oh yes! Monica, get in here! There's a high-speed car chase on

(looks at what she's holding and shies away) Oh dear God, they gave us
glasses

No, they gave us glasses with lipstick on them! I mean, if they didn't
change the glasses, who knows what else they didn't change. (He glares at her.) Come on
sweetie, I just want this weekend to be perfect, I mean we can change rooms, can't we

Okay, but let's do it now though, because Chopper 5 just lost it's
feed! (He grabs their bags and sprints out.

3.SceneDescription: Chandler and Monica's weekend, a hotel clerk is showing them their new room.

lines.Line: I think you'll find this room more to your liking
Okay, great. (He grabs the remote and turns on the TV to the chase.
(watching the chase) They say he's only got half a tank left
Half a tank? We still got a lot of high-speed chasing to do
This is a garden view room, and we paid for an ocean view room
Our last ocean view room was unacceptable to you

(To Chandler) Excuse me, umm, can I talk to you over here for just a
second
Uh-huh. (He doesn't take his eyes off the TV.
Uh-huh. (He doesn't take his eyes off the TV.

Look, these clowns are trying to take us for a ride and I'm not gonna
let 'em! And we're not a couple of suckers

I hear ya, Mugsy! But look, all these rooms are fine okay? Can you
just pick one so I can watch-(realizes)-have a perfect, magical weekend together with you

lines.Character: [Time lapse, Monica and Chandler have changed rooms yet again
lines.Line: Time lapse, Monica and Chandler have changed rooms yet again.

lines.Character: [Time lapse, Monica and Chandler have changed rooms yet again
lines.Line: Time lapse, Monica and Chandler have changed rooms yet again.

(watching TV, in fact, ER is on.) Nothing! It's over! Dammit! This is
regularly scheduled programming

Can we turn the TV off? Okay? Do we really want to spend the entire
weekend like this
Oh, I'm sorry, am I getting in the way of all the room switching fun
Hey, don't blame me for wigging tonight
Hey, don't blame me for wigging tonight

Oh, who should I blame? The nice bell man who had to drag out luggage
to 10 different rooms

I don't know, how about the idiot who thought he could drive from Albany
to Canada on a half a tank of gas
Do not speak ill of the dead
Do not speak ill of the dead
Do not speak ill of the dead

We're supposed to uh, be spending a romantic weekend together, it-it,
what is the matter with you

I just want to watch a little television. What is the big deal? Geez,
relax mom

4.SceneDescription:
Chandler and Joey's, Chandler is returning from his disastrous weekend. He
throws his bag down and sits down on one of the leather chairs, but he sits on something
and picks it up and throws it away.

lines.Line: It was terrible. I fought with (Pause) my colleagues y'know, the entire time. Are you kidding with this? (Throws away another Rollo
Oh, so your weekend was a total bust
Uh, no, I got to see Donald Trump waiting for an elevator
Yeah. Umm, Chandler can I talk to you outside for a second
Hey, how was your chef thing
Hey, how was your chef thing

Oh, it was awful. (To Chandler) I guess some people just don't
appreciate really good food

Well, maybe it was the kind of food that tasted good at first but then
made everybody vomit and have diarrhea
Chandler! (Motions for him to come outside.
Chandler! (Motions for him to come outside.

Okay, I'd like to know how much the room was because I'd like to pay my
half
Yeah, just think of it as $25 per room
(sticking his head out the door) What are you guys woofing about
Chandler stole a twenty from my purse
Chandler stole a twenty from my purse

Nooooo!!! Y'know what? Now that I think about it, I constantly find myself
without twenties and you always have lots

5.SceneDescription: Chandler and Joey's, Joey is watching TV.

lines.Line:
Hey, Mr. Bing. That uh, hotel you stayed at called. Said someone left an
eyelash curler in your room
'Cause I figured you'd hooked up with some girl and she'd left it there
Yes that would have made more sense
Yes that would have made more sense

Y'know, I-I don't even feel like I know you anymore man! All right, look,
I'm just gonna ask you this one time. And whatever you say, I'll believe ya. (Pause.) Were
you, or were you not on a gay cruise?

6.SceneDescription: Monica and Rachel's, Monica is doing a crossword puzzle.

lines.Line:
I just came over to drop off…nothing. So that weekend kinda
sucked, huh
So, I guess this is over
Well, y'know, you and me, it had to end sometime
Because of the weekend, we had a fight

Chandler that's crazy! If you give up every time you'd have a fight with
someone you'd never be with anyone longer than—Ohhh! (They both realize something
there.

(laughs) You are so cute! No. No, it was a fight. You deal with it and
move on! It's nothing to freak out about
Ohh, welcome to an adult relationship! (She goes to kiss him.

7.SceneDescription: Monica and Rachel's, the gang, minus Ross are playing Madlibs. Phoebe is reading hers.

lines.Line:
The most popular Phoebe in tennis is called the overhand Phoebe. And if
you win, you must slap your opponent on the Phoebe and say, "Hi, Phoebe!
Oh that's cute! We really all enjoyed it. But y'know, it doesn't count
Count in our heads as-as good Madlibs

lines.Character: (They putting their notepads down and get up to leave
lines.Line: They putting their notepads down and get up to leave.

Wait-wait, guys! If-if we follow the rules, it's still fun and it means
something

Guys, rules are good! Rules help control the fun! (They all leave and
close the door on Monica.) Ohhh! (Throws her notepad down in disgust.
